name: Between the Lines: Chapter 1
description:
Install instructions

To run: Unzip folder and open the application file

Warning - (do not open the 32bit application unless computer runs on a 32bit OS system)

Application should launch and display the main menu.

To use: Use the Left Mouse button/spacebar to progress text. Use Right Mouse button to access the system menu to Save, Load, access Preferences or review the Dialog.

The scroll wheel can be used to rewind text (not recommended as it may affect internal variables).
